content.text:
# Tillydrone/Seaton/Old Aberdeen (ward)

| alt1     = Location of the ward
}}
Tillydrone/Seaton/Old Aberdeen is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Aberdeen City Council. It elects three Councillors.
